name: Doctor
description: Make a difference in people's lives by diagnosing and treating illnesses. Specialize in surgery, pediatrics, cardiology, or research to find your calling.

name: Software Engineer
description: Innovate and build the future by writing code and solving complex problems in software, AI, or cybersecurity fields.

name: Civil Engineer
description: Shape cities and infrastructure by designing bridges, roads, and buildings with sustainability and safety in mind.

name: Teacher
description: Empower the next generation by sharing knowledge, inspiring learning, and shaping futures.

name: Entrepreneur
description: Turn ideas into reality by starting your own venture and creating value for society and yourself.
